verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* Saul's \w son|strong="H1121"\w* Ish-bosheth \w had|strong="H3478"\w* news \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* became \w feeble|strong="H7503"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* troubled.
